data.message:
Eminem,
You acting feminine.
Trying to stay relevant
Cause you’re a has been.
Your opinion means shit
When’s the last time you had a hit?
Fuck Trump? Fuck you,
You can’t even come up with something new.
Think you’re the greatest of all time?
Doesn’t take much talent to rhyme.
I mean, you failed the ninth grade
Not once, not twice but three times.
All that bullshit that you spit
About being from the hood in Detroit....
You were raised in Warren or some shit.
Rejected by your dad,
Trying to act all bad,
If making America great makes you mad,
Leave it and make America glad.
Stupid is something you just can’t fix,
Stop sucking so many left wing dicks.
Try something new,
Try it with chicks.
The heart of the matter
Mr. Mathers
Is your display of all that you lack.
Take a look in the mirror my brother,
You ain’t black.....

replies.message: Trash. Straight trash
Zahub Malik 10 more posts.....😝
That was bomb a f

You know you're just dirt,
Sitting in front of a computer releasing some fart,
Rhyming ain't tough but not everyone becomes famous for it,
Look at you, you're sitting at home posting hopeless shit,
Eminem is the rap god, even Trump can't go up against him,
Stop bitching around in his name, why don't you go date Kim?
Leave him alone, he's a free man,
He's voicing all the people around the world, goddamn!
And how do you know he's interested in guys?
Been a victim? Ooh, that wasn't wise
Get a life man, stop rhyming against the god of rhymes,
See if you can be famous like him, get your picture on the front of New York Times
Hridika Tahsin dirt and fart doesn’t rhyme......take an English class.
Oh yeah? You take the English classes bro
Hridika Tahsin I’m not your bro 😂
Lucky for you. :)
Wack!!!
Eminem is a has been? Eminem is trying to stay relevant??? Who is this guy?
Nnadozie Ekwuribe 💤
Donny dafuq u sayin'? I think you preety damn sick ...you aint even famous... quit spittin shit here lil shady didnt tag you 'Remember?
Dafuq? Speak English retard
Sooooo Weak
Stephanie Ssk so ugly

Says the person with how many multi million selling albums?! Says the guy who ISN'T the most successful rapper of all time...oh and just because you can rhyme doesn't make you a good rapper...there's a big difference.
I never claimed to be a rapper.....wouldn’t want to be a rapper
Stephanie Ssk keep telling yourself that.....
Stephanie Ssk if you tell a lie often enough it becomes the truth....
Stephanie Ssk did I hurt your little feelings?
LOL Great Bars, NOT. STFU!
Beinerth Chitiva Machado did somebody hurt your hero? Pussy

Stephanie Ssk I never claimed to be a rapper, you realize people were rhyming words hundreds of years before rap cam along, right? What does my age have to do with anything? Yeah, I’m a wannabe biker who’s been riding Harley for 30 years.......do you think you’re immune to aging? I was once young and stupid like you. 😜

Brad Trenholmewhat don’t you understand? I don’t wish to be a rapper, have never attempted to rap and don’t listen to it. I simply rhymed and all of a sudden you think rap has the copyright to rhyme. You’re even dumber than I originally thought.
